DOC.brief_summary: The objective study examine treatment unstable Intertrochanteric fracture short Gamma nail , compare use dynamic hip screw ( DHS ) . This prospective study . Sixty patient unstable Intertrochanteric fracture randomize treat use either Gamma nail DHS . The patient follow 12 month . The primary endpoint clinical outcome measure Merle d'Aubigne Postelhip score .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Gamma Nail Versus Dynamic Hip Screw Treatment Unstable Intertrochanteric Fractures
DOC.criteria: Acute Intertrochanteric fracture A132 AO/OTA Abbreviated mental score > 6 Community ambulator ( prefracture state ) Previous arthritis Pathological fracture Chronic corticosteroid use Concomitant low extremity fracture
